game.name: Hungry Cats 饥饿的猫
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 집에 있는 고양이들은 이미 굶주림에 미쳐 있습니다, 빨리 돌아와서 고양이들에게 먹이를 주세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The cats at home are already crazy with hunger, hurry back and feed them!

reviewHighlights.text: It's an intriguing puzzle with a moderate level of difficulty. 8/10 recommend.
